article_title: PERSPECTIVE: Jefferson Healthcare: What care do we all really need?
article_text:
Port Townsend, WA (98368)

Today

Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Stephen Workman, Port Townsend

og.description: Of course Jefferson Healthcare does not discriminate. But our 25-bed critical access hospital does have to be discriminating every day about which sick patients it can serve best and how
